info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 8 at 5:00PM EDT until September 9 at 12:24AM EDT by NWS Melbourne FL
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Melbourne FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida...
Little Wekiva River near Altamonte Springs 2n affecting Seminole County.
.Additional heavy rainfall across the Little Wekiva Basin will send river levels briefly to Minor Flood Stage late this afternoon and into early evening. River levels should then rapidly drop through this evening, but remaining in Action Stage through late tonight.
For the Little Wekiva...including Altamonte Springs 2n...Minor flooding is forecast.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 800 PM EDT.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Little Wekiva River near Altamonte Springs 2n.
* WHEN...Through 8 PM.
* IMPACTS...At 28.5 feet, Minor flooding near the river in the Altamonte Springs area.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 PM EDT Monday the stage was 27.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 27.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise. It will then fall below flood stage this evening to 28.7 feet late this afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 28.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT
